box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font:
✅ なんでも主語に
ing 形、to 不定詞、節、前置詞
Under the doormat is ~~~.
✅ 標準は単純な (代) 名詞
to 不定詞や節は高尚なイメージ
✅ 友達同士などで主語省略
Are you Enjoying the party?
I Hope you recover soon!
✅ 命令文
(高圧) Concentrate!
(勧め) Take a look at it.
✅ 無生物主語 → 便利
The news made us all excited.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 157px; height: 1px; padding-top: 789px; margin-left: 82px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 392px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1001px; margin-left: 757px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font:
✅ be 動詞は省略されることがある
感情が激昂したとき
You are a liar!
手短に切れくよく発言したいとき
Is Everything OK?

switch.text: ✅ be 動詞は省略されることがある...

div.font:
トレーニングを積むしかない事項
✅ どの動詞がどの文型でどう使われるのか

switch.text: トレーニングを積むしかない事項✅ どの動詞がどの文型でどう使われるのか...

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 393px; height: 1px; padding-top: 658px; margin-left: 757px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font:
✅ 他動型のもつ強い「及ぶ」感触
[他] I know Monet. (深い知識を持っている)
[自] I know about Monet. (印象派だな、光の画家だな、くらいの知っている感)
[自] I know of Monet. ( あー聞いたころあるなー。建築やってんだっけ？くらい)
[他] He shot the bird. (彼は鳥を 撃った)
[自] He shot at the bird. (彼は鳥をめがけて撃った)
✅ 目的語説明文
(名詞) Just call me Ken.
(形容詞) He smashed the lock open.
(前置詞句) I saw a cockroach in the kitchen.
(ing 形) I saw the players training.
(過去分詞) Harry saw Lucy bullied by her classmate.
(知覚動詞 + 動詞原形) I saw Mary cross the street.
(知覚動詞 + 動詞原形) Didn't you hear the phone ring?
(使役動詞) I'll do anything to make you happy.
(使役動詞) I had my hair cut.
(使役動詞) Don't let me down.
(使役動詞 + 動詞原形) I'll have my secretary fax it to you rightaway.
(使役動詞 + 動詞原形) The PE tacher made the students run in the snow.
(使役動詞 + 動詞原形) My daughter's upset because I won't let her get a tattoo.
(get + to 不定詞) I got one of my classmates to help my sister with her homowork.
(to 不定詞) My parents always tell me to study harder!

switch.text: ✅ 他動型のもつ強い「及ぶ」感触...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 393px; height: 1px; padding-top: 857px; margin-left: 1164px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font:
✅ レポート文
(that 節) Tom said to me he loved me.
(that 節) I think Mary is gorgeous.
(whether/if 節) I didn't know whether/if you had already paid the bill.
✅ say, hear, tell などのコミュニケーション動詞では、しばしば現在形が優先される
She says she isn't going to marry him.
I hear that the PTA is going to hold a fund-raising concert next month.
Kaori tells me that Kenji is going to be expelled from school.
✅ レポート文
(that 節) I'm so sad he lost his job.
(that 節) I'm afraid we cannot give you a refund.

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
